titles: By the King. A proclamation. Charles R. ... We having, with the advice and consent of Our Parliaments, past so many acts in favors of the Protestant religion, against field-conventicles ...
author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: Title from caption and first line of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at White-hall, the 29. day of June, 1679, and of Our Reign the thretty one year.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Dissenters, Religious --  Legal status, laws, etc. --  Scotland --  Early works to 1800.
